plot: Freddy comes to a party and is a hit; he then goes on to be the star quarterback at the football game.
title: Freddy the Freshman
plot_es: Freddy comes to a party and is a hit; he then goes on to be the star quarterback at the football game.
plot_en: Freddy comes to a party and is a hit; he then goes on to be the star quarterback at the football game.
